User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

Windows 7. Firefox 6.0, ChatZilla 0.9.87.
See http://pastebin.com/NiKvYK9W for other extensions I have installed.

After Opening Chatzilla I have gone to Chatzilla > Preferences to change my settings.


Actual results:

Global Settings: http://i.imgur.com/baTJc.png (Text boxes not auto resized)
Network Settings: http://i.imgur.com/NKQm2.png (Text boxes auto resized)


Expected results:

Both the Global Settings and Network specific settings windows should have their text boxes auto resized.
